mapper.select:
select
from ProductionPlanningDetail where productionLineId = #{id} and (start_time >= #{time} or end_time > #{time}) and is_planning = '1' and goodName in (select name from ProductClass) order by start_time

select
from ProductionPlanningDetail where is_planning = '0' and GETDATE() < deliveryOfFactory_time order by deliveryOfFactory_time
